Class ViewContext

Object
ViewContext
public final class ViewContext extends Object
Represents the context of a View.

      BTO System getter.

    • getScanner

      public Scanner getScanner()
      Getter for scanner. Avoid recreating Scanner instances, use this shared instance.
      Returns:
      scanner

    • clearViewStack

      public void clearViewStack()
      Clear view stack.

    • getCurrentView

      public View getCurrentView() throws IllegalStateException
      Returns:
      The top view.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If there are no more views.

    • startFromView

      public void startFromView(View view) throws RuntimeException
      Start from a view. Within a view, you can navigate to other views by returning in View.render(ViewContext). Return null to go back (i.e. cancel). Return a new view instance to go to that view. Return the view (i.e. this) to stay within the view. See ProjectsView and ProjectEnquiryView for an example.
      Parameters:
      view - root view.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException

    • getUser

      public Optional<User> getUser()
      User getter.
      Returns:
      user can be null (i.e. not logged in).

    • setUser

      public void setUser(User user)
      User setter.
      Parameters:
      user - user to set.

    • resetFilters

      public void resetFilters()
      Reset filters applied to this view context. Used on logout.
